name: Sword: Depths of the Void
storyline:
"The Void has opened again. You see that purple rift in the sky?" - Tiela Thorn

Our main character, Trent Helms, was walking down his well-known trail, and had reached the end of it- a cliff, outlooking the wonders of Amethyst Valley. While Trent was looking out on this cliff, a quick explosion startled him. A strange sword inside a stone had appeared behind him... as it flew straight towards his hands. Trent was confused. His vision began to darken for a few seconds. He felt as if he was traveling at 100mph. Suddenly... he ended up in a whole new world. Crystal Depths. A place only for those who have been given the Spectral Sword, a sword that can morph its blades into glowing blue objects, like a bow or hammer, or even a spear. Trent had obtained this sword... but he has yet to know that this sword gives the user a quest. A quest to close the Void once more.
summary: Sword: Depths of the Void is WorthyWorm and The Sword Teams first upcoming game, releasing in 2023-2024. Sword: Depths of the Void is a 2D Action RPG Platformer with a special sword that can morph it's blade into different weapons. Play as Trent Helms, the chosen one of this legendary sword, and make your way through various areas, bring people with you on your journey, explore a town in the sky, and much, much more.
